name: Overwhelm
flavor: You overload their senses, turning all their subconscious thoughts into conscious ones.

metadata.flavor: You overload their senses, turning all their subconscious thoughts into conscious ones.

effects.tier1: 6 + R psychic damage; I < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
effects.tier2: 10 + R psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, weakened (save ends)
effects.tier3: 14 + R psychic damage; I < STRONG, dazed (save ends)

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You start crying, and you can't use triggered actions or make free strikes until the end of the target's next turn.
